Content.Text:
◆◆ Things You Can Sit On ◆◆

If you place any furniture with "Bench", "Chair",
or "Sofa" in the name, you can <RED>sit on it.</RED> Move
<RED>in front of the furniture</RED> and press the A Button
to sit down. You can press the A Button again
to stand up.

◆◆ Roads ◆◆

If you line up road pieces end-to-end, you can
build a road. <RED>You cannot place anything on top
of a road</RED>, but you can place arch-shaped
objects that go over the road.

◆◆ Arch-Shaped Objects ◆◆

You can place arch-shaped objects so that they
go over a road. First, lay down the road pieces,
then you can place the arches over them.

◆◆ Fields ◆◆

You can <RED>place other objects on top of</RED> any
object with "Field" in its name. However, you
can't put a "Field" object on top of something
else. Combine fields and other decorations to
bring your ideal scene to life!

◆◆ Three-Wheeler ◆◆

You can zoom quickly from place to place on
your custom Three-Wheeler. This speedy
vehicle will carry you just about anywhere!

Just take it out of the garage to ride it.

◆◆ Mechanical Lion ◆◆

You can ride on an Eastern-style mechanical
lion to move around faster than usual.

Just take it out of the garage to ride it.

◆◆ Mechanical Panda ◆◆

You can ride around on a mechanical panda.
You'll need <GREEN>coins</GREEN> to ride it. One coin will power
it for a while.

Just take it out of the garage to ride it.

◆◆ Mechanical Duck ◆◆

You can ride around on a mechanical duck.
You'll need <GREEN>coins</GREEN> to ride it. One coin will power
it for a while.

Just take it out of the garage to ride it.

◆◆ Mechanical Penguin ◆◆

You can ride around on a mechanical penguin.
You'll need <GREEN>coins</GREEN> to ride it. One coin will power
it long for a while.

Just take it out of the garage to ride it.

◆◆ Bird Feeder ◆◆

You can <RED>put chicken feed into your bird feeder</RED>
just like the feeder located inside a chicken
coop. One feeder holds <BLUE>five servings</BLUE>.

◆◆ Hot Springs ◆◆

When you take a dip in a hot spring, your <RED>health
will recover.</RED>

Get in, relax, and let your troubles melt away.

◆◆ Mini Propeller ◆◆

If you equip this, you might <RED>be able to fly</RED>! It's
one of many inventions engineered by a brilliant
scholar in ancient times.

◆◆ Fish Hatcheries ◆◆

When you set a fish hatchery at a Harvesting
Point, you can raise <RED>fish</RED> or <RED>pearls</RED>. Fish increase
in number every day, but pearls take more time
to grow, so be patient.

◆◆ Doors ◆◆

Objects labeled as "Doors" will automatically
open when you get near them. They won't
automatically open for animals, but if you push
an animal into a door, it'll open and you'll both
go in.

◆◆ Music Boards ◆◆

These special boards make a sound when you
step on them. There are specific boards for
each note in the scale.

Line them up and run across to play a song!

◆◆ Bird Feeder ◆◆

You can <RED>put chicken feed into your bird feeder</RED>
just like the feeder located inside a chicken
coop. One feeder holds a maximum of <BLUE>ten
servings</BLUE>.

◆◆ Rabbit Feeder ◆◆

You can <RED>put rabbit food into your rabbit feeder</RED>
just like the feeder located inside a chicken
coop. One feeder holds a maximum of <BLUE>ten
servings</BLUE>.

◆◆ Cannon ◆◆

If you place a cannon in town, you can crawl
inside and blast off to fly back to your farm.

But keep in mind, you might not land on target,
so use it at your own risk!

◆◆ Garage ◆◆

A place where you can store your motor
vehicles. From Three-Wheelers to Mechanical
Lions, you'll find them all here.

Step in, rev up and go for a ride!

◆◆ Television ◆◆

Your TV is the place to go for everything from
weather forecasts to charming series. There's
something different on every day, so go ahead:
channel surf and find your favorites!

◆◆ Wrapping Table ◆◆

This is where you can wrap items. No cheap
wrapping here: you'll be using linen or cotton,
so go ahead and prepare your finest cloth wrap!

◆◆ Kitchen ◆◆

Start cooking by standing in front of the kitchen
area and pressing the <RED>A Button</RED>. Collect more
recipes to expand the variety of foods you're
able to prepare!
